channel.title: Kingsley Dennis on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Kingsley Dennis on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: "After the car", John Urry and Kingsley Dennis
item.description: Kingsley Dennis and John Urry have a new book out, “After The Car”.  I have a review copy on the way from the publisher; until it arrives, you can see the intro and the index from the Amazon link below.  This is an oddly appropriate text to anticipate the week GM went bankrupt. Allow me for a brief moment to indulge. I would like to inform you that my co-authored book titled ‘After the Car’ has now been published (finally!
